name: get_coin_markets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Find markets on different exchanges that trade a specific coin.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

uuid.description: UUID of the coin you want to request markets for.

offset.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

orderby.description:
Index to sort on. Default is 24h volume.

Default value: 24hVolume
Allowed values:
24hVolume price

limit.description:
Limit. Used for pagination

Default value: 50
Size range: 0-100

search.description: Value to search for within results, e.g. exchange names, currency names, or currency symbols

referencecurrencyuuid.description:
UUID of reference currency, which rate is used to calculate the volume. Defaults to US Dollar

Default value: yhjMzLPhuIDl

orderdirection.description:
Order in ascending or descending order

Default value: desc
Allowed values:
desc asc
